name: STHEAVEN
description:
STHEAVEN is a simplistic 2D platformer. You play a human who will soon die and go to heaven. Choose your last actions and decide your fate!

(Click on the dialogue bubbles to go to the next text)

How to play : 

Use arow axes for moving the player

Up arow for one of the power

Mouse to pass the text and select your answers

Members of the team : La Table

Emilien Payet : Programmer / FX

Adnan Esber : Manager / Integrator / LD

Arthur Mensah : Ilustrator / GD
